summary: Served working drivers by developing an IoT dashcam that saves money and provides security
Built an backend/embedded video processing and streaming pipeline from the ground up in Rust
Designed a REST API to serve mobile users
Wrote testing suite for thousands of lines of code
Agile development with coordination between software, hardware, product design, and sales teams
Worked close to the product in a rapidly-evolving environment
Issue tracking, code reviews, and documentation authoring
Maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitLab and Docker
Improved real-time food/image detection speed for robotic assisted feeding
Deployed machine learning models in Python with PyTorch, Tensorflow, and CUDA

Investigated curiosity as an intrinsic motivator for reinforced learning
Worked in a variety of development and research teams
Created novel methodologies for measuring the practicality of facial forgery detection models
Expanded a facial forgery video dataset by 3 fold
Independently conducted research and compiled findings into a paper within a 10 week period
Deployed machine learning models (GANs) and utilized transfer learning in Python with PyTorch
Administration of a Linux server for running experiments in Docker
Led a team of 7 to develop a data management application to consolidate lab reports and inventory
Designed a drone-mounted LiDAR mapping data collection system used for multiple lab experiments
Supervised code reviews, weekly meetings, ticket tracking, and weekly meetings
Full-stack development for a Windows application using C#/.NET and an MVVM pattern
Established real-time data streams used for drone simulations
Agile/Scrum development in a rapidly-evolving environment

Taught machine learning and programming to teenagers using Jupyter Notebooks
Image classifications with CNNs
